column2: [From.GetFullName], a witcher in your employment has expressed his desire to leave your court.
He can surely stay for a while longer.
Some gold will change his mind.
He can leave if he wishes to.

Honoured [Root.GetTitledName],

after thinking your request over I have decided to continue to stay in your employment.

Witcher [From.GetFullName]

Honoured [Root.GetTitledName],

after thinking your request over and seeing your appreciation of my services I have decided to continue to stay in your employment.

Witcher [From.GetFullName]

Honoured [Root.GetTitledName],

after thinking your request over I have decided to seek employment elsewhere.

Witcher [From.GetFullName]

Honoured [Root.GetTitledName],

I am offering my skill as a witcher and wishing to seek your employment.

Witcher [From.GetFullName]
I have no need for witcher.

Honoured [Root.GetTitledName],

I wish to inform you that [From.GetName] is plagued by monsters no more.

Witcher [FromFrom.GetFullName]
